title: IRS Tax & 1098-T Information  · Angelo State University
description: Paying for college may affect your annual taxes and/or your parents’ taxes. See this page for more information and answers to the most common questions.

paragraphs: ASU students will receive a form for tax year 2024 in the mail or online by Jan. 31, 2025. This includes high school students receiving ASU credit through Dual Credit Programs.

Box 1 Payments Received reports combined payments from all sources, but it will not exceed the qualified tuition and fees billed. Box 1 may include payments that are also reported in Box 5, Scholarships and Grants. Therefore, the amounts on Form 1098-T Box 1 might differ from personal payments you made to ASU.
Details that you may want for tax preparation are available through the online 1098-T Tax Notification. Current and former students can find it on theRamPort Student Accounts page.
You can also find helpful answers to common tax questions using theFAQlink at the bottom of this page.
Details that you may want for tax preparation are available through the online 1098-T Tax Notification.
View Tax Notification (form with details)
You can get help with RamPort access and expired passwords from the IT Service Center 24/7 at 1-866-942-2911 or go to thePassword Help webpage.
The IRS Form 1098-T that is mailed to students is also available online.
View Form 1098-T (form only)
Forms will be available by Jan. 31!
Electronic Consent

Angelo State University offers Online Consent to students who wish to receive their IRS form 1098-T online automatically rather than by mail. This option must be made before Jan. 10 to apply to forms available Jan 31.
Once you complete the Online Consent, you will be able to return to the site to view/print/email a copy of your formwhen it is ready Jan. 31.

Box 1 reportscombined payments from all sources, but itwill not exceedthe qualified tuition and feesbilled.Box 1 may include payments that are also reported in Box 5, Scholarships and Grants. Therefore, the amounts on Form 1098-T might differ from personal payments you made to ASU.
Box 1 may include:
Box 1 will not include aid required by its terms to pay for non-qualified fees such as housing and food scholarships.
Box 1 may include emergency aid grants to pay for qualified tuition and related expenses.
Box 5 reports the total amount of scholarships/grants disbursed. Box 5 may include aid that is also reported in Box 1 Payments.
Box 5 may include:
Box 5 will not include emergency aid grants received.
Details that you may want for tax preparation are available through the online 1098-T Tax Notification. Current and former students can find it on theRamPort Student Accounts page.
Most students can expect the following terms to be included on their 2024 form.

Your terms can be different because your transaction dates determine your tax year. You can see the exact terms and transactions that were included for you by viewing your online 1098-T Tax Notification.

Please be advised that Angelo State University cannot give legal, tax, or accounting advice, cannot determine if students qualify for a tax credit, and cannot determine the tax treatment of other higher education transactions on your personal tax return. To see if you qualify for a credit, and for help in calculating the amount of your credit, seeIRS Publication 970 Tax Benefits for Education, Form 8863, and the Form 1040 instructions. TheInteractive Tax Assistant toolon IRS.gov can help determine eligibility for certain educational credits.

Box 1 Payments Received reports combined payments from all sources, but it will not exceed the qualified tuition and fees billed. Box 1 may include payments that are also reported in Box 5 Scholarships and Grants. Therefore, the amounts on Form 1098-T Box 1 might be different from personal payments you made to ASU.
Details that you may want for tax preparation are available through the online 1098-T Tax Notification. Current and former students can find it on theRamPort Student Accounts page.
You can also find helpful answers to common tax questions using theFAQlink on the right side of this page.

Former students still have some limited access to RamPort. This includes transfer, withdrawn, or students who have graduated. These students will be able to see the Tax Notifications in RamPort for the tax years they attended ASU.
Passwords older than 90 days will expire.
If you know your last password, visit theChange your Password webpage.
If you do not know your last password, you can get your password reset by calling the IT Service Center 24/7 at 1-866-942-2911.
Details that you may want for tax preparation are available through the online 1098-T Tax Notification.
View Tax Notification (form with details)

Electronic Consent

Angelo State University offers Online Consent to students who wish to receive their IRS form 1098-T online automatically rather than by mail. This option must be made before Jan. 10 to apply to forms available Jan 31.
Once you complete the Online Consent, you will be able to return to the site to view/print/email a copy of your formwhen it is ready Jan. 31.

Box 1 reportscombined payments from all sources, but itwill not exceedthe qualified tuition and feesbilled. Box 1 may include payments that are also reported in Box 5 Scholarships and Grants. Therefore, the amounts on Form 1098-T might be different from personal payments you made to ASU.
Box 1 may include:
Box 1 will not include aid that is required by its terms to pay for non-qualified fees such as housing and food scholarships.
Box 1 may include emergency aid grants used to pay for qualified tuition and related expenses.
Box 5 reports the total amount of scholarship/grants disbursed. Box 5 may include aid that is also reported in Box 1 Payments.
Box 5 may include:
Box 5 will not include emergency aid grants received.
Details that you may want for tax preparation are available through the online 1098-T Tax Notification. Current and former students can find it on theRamPort Student Accounts page.

Will you receive a 2024 Form 1098-T? Yes. Forms will be available in late Jan. 2025.Remember that your Tax Notification (form with details) will still be available in RamPort (see My RamPort Access) after you graduate.

Please be advised that Angelo State University cannot give legal, tax, or accounting advice, cannot determine if students qualify for a tax credit, and cannot determine the tax treatment of other higher education transactions on your personal tax return. To see if you qualify for a credit, and for help in calculating the amount of your credit, seeIRS Publication 970 Tax Benefits for Education, Form 8863, and the Form 1040 instructions. TheInteractive Tax Assistant toolon IRS.gov can help determine eligibility for certain educational credits.

Box 1 Payments Received reports combined payments from all sources, but it will not exceed the qualified tuition and fees billed. Box 1 may include payments that are also reported in Box 5 Scholarships and Grants. Therefore, the amounts on Form 1098-T Box 1 might be different from personal payments you made to ASU.
Details that you may want for tax preparation are available through the online 1098-T Tax Notification. Current and former students can find it on theRamPort Student Accounts page.
You can also find helpful answers to common tax questions using theFAQlink on the right side of this page.
The Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act of 1974 (FERPA), as amended, establishes requirements regarding the privacy of student records. FERPA governs:

When a student reaches the age of 18 OR is attending a postsecondary institution, regardless of age, FERPA rights transfer from the parent to the student. Parents of ASU students may not receive information from a student’s records unless the student creates a FERPA/Proxy Authorized User from his/her secure RamPort account.
Details that you may want for tax preparation are available through the online 1098-T Tax Notification.

Students must create a FERPA/Proxy Access for you to view the Tax Notification. Without this authorization, you will not be able to see the Tax Notification. Once your student gives you FERPA/Proxy Access, you will receive an email with further instructions. Visit theFERPA/Proxy Access web pagefor more details.
After the student has created your access, you may use theProxy Loginto view the Tax Notification.
Details that you may want for tax preparation are available through the 1098-T Tax Notification.
Without FERPA/Proxy Access, parents must ask their student to provide them with the Tax Notification from RamPort. The University will not provide the Tax Notification from RamPort to parents.
The IRS Form 1098-T that is mailed to students is also available online.
View Form 1098-T (form only)
Forms will be available by Jan. 31!

To see if you qualify for a credit, and for help in calculating the amount of your credit, seeIRS Publication 970 Tax Benefits for Education, Form 8863, and the Form 1040 instructions. TheInteractive Tax Assistant toolon IRS.gov can help determine eligibility for certain educational credits.

Please be advised that Angelo State University cannot give legal, tax, or accounting advice, cannot determine if students qualify for a tax credit, and cannot determine the tax treatment of other higher education transactions on your personal tax return. Please consult a tax professional, the IRS at 800-829-1040, or theIRS Publication 970 Tax Benefits for Education.
